titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the base erosion minimum tax rate for taxable years ending in 2020.
Help Our Businesses Recover Act of 2021
Help Our Businesses Recover Act of 2021

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Help Our Businesses Recover Act of 2021
This bill eliminates, for taxable years ending in 2020, the base erosion minimum tax rate applicable to certain large corporations that have deductions with respect to amounts paid or accrued to foreign-related parties exceeding 3% of their total deductions.
